GSD.description:
HID: hidraw: fix memory leak in hidraw_release()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.327 by commit 1bea0bbf66001b0c7bf239a4d70eaf47824d3feb. For more details please see the references link.
